ChangeList.Description: Added the **tenantApprovals** property to the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **displayName** property from the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **allowedTenantIds** property from the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **privateEndpointConnections** relationship from the [privateLinkResourcePolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/privateLinkResourcePolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Removed the **oauth2PermissionGrants** relationship from the [user](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/user?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
